alert.note: Alert for Corson; Dewey; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 1:19AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Corson, northeastern Dewey and western Walworth Counties through 245 AM CDT/145 AM MDT/... At 218 AM CDT/118 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Indian Memorial Rec Area to 7 miles southeast of White Horse. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Indian Creek Rec Area around 225 AM CDT. Glenham around 230 AM CDT. New Everets Resort around 235 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Selby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
